body: Oh man, the comment section on this one is full of fucking SJW retards, these people have nothing better to do. Also, @popober, you've got no fucking idea what you're talking about, lmao.

And let's just lay it out; yaoi of any kind has no place using the "focus anal" tag, as that suggests there is any other way to have gay sex.

Then again, I suppose there are those works that feature extreme docking/urethral fucking or some shit. But seriously.
